name: <contribution>_max_date
description: Date of the latest contribution of a certain type for a given author. For Gerrit, <contribution> can be approval, changeset, comment or patchset.

name: <contribution>_min_date
description: Date of the first (oldest) contribution of a certain type for a given author. For Gerrit, <contribution> can be approval, changeset, comment or patchset.
